entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with ice pellets before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
